resources.string: Create a %1$s digit passcode to securely sign in to your blinx account

Fund your wallet to start paying for bills and carrying out transfers
We need your BVN to successfully sync with your bank account
Link multiple bank accounts for easy deposit
Your ID proof and address proof are the documents required for KYC verification.
Let\'s help save time and reduce risk by automating your bills payment.
Your BVN is secure. It does not give us access to your other bank accounts or transactions. We will only have access to your full name, gender, date of birth and phone number
We need your Bank Verification Number (BVN) to confirm who you are.
We have sent OTP to the email or phone number attached to your BVN"
Wallet to receive funds in Dollars
